title: One Piece: Glorious Island
synopsis: An exclusive anime prologue to One Piece Film Z with an original story penned by manga creator Eiichiro Oda.
characters: ['Monkey D., Luffy', 'Roronoa, Zoro', 'Sanji', 'Nico, Robin', 'Tony Tony, Chopper', 'Usopp', 'Nami', 'Brook', 'Franky']
voices: ['Tanaka, Mayumi', 'Nakai, Kazuya', 'Hirata, Hiroaki', 'Yamaguchi, Yuriko', 'Ootani, Ikue', 'Yamaguchi, Kappei', 'Okamura, Akemi', 'Cho', 'Yao, Kazuki']
